column4: Anyone can tell me how to workaround the openoffice crash on ubuntu? :S

what open office crash?.. works fine for me
but none of those solutions seem to work for me :-(
I can paste a backtrace
IndyGunFreak,http://paste.ubuntu.com/178827/
are you using jaunty?
yeah
are you using the verison of office that came w/ it, or did you try to do an upgrade
I tried both
I installed the one from OO.org and tried the one came with it
well that doesn't make any sense at all.. i've put ubuntu on several machines, and helped several others, and no probs at all.
I don't know either what's the issue :S
are you using 64bit?
nope
it's a 64Bit machine but a 32 Bit Ubuntu
weird..
yupp
since I upgraded to jaunty that is, before I am sure that ooo was working for me
dunno, maybe something happened in the upgrade?.. i did a clean install, and its working fine
maybe
